file.name: gosecure_edr.yaml
file.content:
basePath: /
components:
  securitySchemes:
    BasicAuth:
      scheme: basic
      type: http
info:
  contact:
    email: towen@gosecure.net
    name: '@owentl'
    url: https://medium.com/@owentl
  description: GoSecure EDR API generated from the GoSecure EDR API Doc
  title: GoSecure EDR
  version: '1.0'
  x-categories:
  - edr
  x-logo: data:image/png;base64,
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
  /api/v2/account:
    get:
      description: This request retrieves information about the authenticated user
        account.
      parameters: []
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Get information about the authenticated user account
  /api/v2/behavior/tags:
    delete:
      parameters:
      - description: CQL expression to filter
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Remove tags from behaviors
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: expression
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: return tags that start with this case-sensitive prefix
        in: query
        name: q
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: limit
        in: query
        name: limit
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Retrieve tags from behaviors
    post:
      parameters:
      - description: CQL expression to filter
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Add tags to behaviors
    put:
      parameters:
      - description: CQL expression to filter
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Replace tags on behaviors
  /api/v2/behavior/{id}/tags:
    delete:
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Remove tags from behaviors on an endpoint
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: Fields to return
        in: query
        name: fields
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Retrieve tags from behaviors on an endpoint
    post:
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Add tags from behaviors on an endpoint
    put:
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Set tags from behaviors on an endpoint
  /api/v2/behaviors:
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: CQL expression
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: fields
        in: query
        name: fields
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: limit
        in: query
        name: limit
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Retrieve informtion on a collection of behaviors
  /api/v2/behaviors/{id}:
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: Fields to return
        in: query
        name: fields
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Retrieve behaviors for specific endpoints
  /api/v2/downloads/extractedfiles/{id}:
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Download extracted files from an endpoint
  /api/v2/endpoints:
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: expression
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: fields
        in: query
        name: fields
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: limit
        in: query
        name: limit
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Get list of endpoints
  /api/v2/endpoints/commands:
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: Fields
        in: query
        name: fields
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: CQL expression to filter
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: max number of results
        in: query
        name: limit
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Return commands for all endpoints
    post:
      parameters:
      - description: CQL expression to filter
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Send commands to multiple endpoints
  /api/v2/endpoints/commands/{id}:
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: Fields
        in: query
        name: fields
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Look for a specific command on an endpoint
    post:
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Send a command to an endpoint
  /api/v2/endpoints/files:
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: Limit of files to retrieve
        in: query
        name: limit
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Get all extracted files for all endpoints on the cluster
  /api/v2/endpoints/files/{id}:
    delete:
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Delete a file off an endpoint
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: Comma seperated list of fields that will be returned
        in: query
        name: fields
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Retrieve files from an endpoint
  /api/v2/endpoints/tags:
    delete:
      parameters:
      - description: CQL expression to filter
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Remove tags for a collection of endpoints
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: Return tags that start with this case-sensitive prefix
        in: query
        name: q
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: CQL expression to filter
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: max number of results
        in: query
        name: limit
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Retrieve tags for a collection of endpoints
    post:
      parameters:
      - description: CQL expression to filter
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Add tags for a collection of endpoints
    put:
      parameters:
      - description: CQL expression to filter
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Modify tags for a collection of endpoints
  /api/v2/endpoints/{id}:
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: Fields
        in: query
        name: fields
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Get Details of endpoint
  /api/v2/endpoints/{id}/commands:
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: Fields
        in: query
        name: fields
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Get commands for an endpoint
  /api/v2/endpoints/{id}/files:
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: Limit of files to retrieve
        in: query
        name: limit
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Comma seperated list of fields that will be returned
        in: query
        name: fields
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Get all files from an endpoint
  /api/v2/endpoints/{id}/tags:
    delete:
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Remove tags for a specified endpoint
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Retrieve tags for a specified endpoint
    post:
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Add tags for a specified endpoint
    put:
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Modify tags for a specified endpoint
  /api/v2/events:
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: expression
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: fields
        in: query
        name: fields
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: limit
        in: query
        name: limit
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Receive events based on criteria
  /api/v2/events/tags:
    delete:
      parameters:
      - description: A CQL search expression that filters on events
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Delete tags for a collection of events
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: A CQL search expression that filters on events
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: The maximum number of tags to return
        in: query
        name: limit
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Return tags beginning with this case-sensitive prefix
        in: query
        name: q
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Get the tags sent to events
    post:
      parameters:
      - description: A CQL search expression that filters on events
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Add tags to a collection of events
    put:
      parameters:
      - description: A CQL search expression that filters on events
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Set tags for a collection of events
  /api/v2/events/{id}:
    get:
      parameters:
      - description: fields
        in: query
        name: fields
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Revieve events based on event id
  /api/v2/events/{id}/tags:
    delete:

      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI

        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}

    get:
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Get the tags for an event
    post:
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Add tag to specific event
    put:
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Set tags for a specific event
  /api/v2/groups:
    delete:
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI

        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: query
        name: fields
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: query
        name: depth
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}

    get:

      - description: expression

        name: expression
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: fields
        in: query
        name: fields
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: limit
        in: query
        name: limit
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Number of levels that will be included in the response
        in: query
        name: depth
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Retrieve Groups
    post:
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        example: '{"type": "manual", "name": "My group name"}'
        in: body
        multiline: true
        name: body
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          example:
            example: '{"type": "manual", "name": "My group name"}'
        description: Generated by Shuffler.io
        required: false
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Create new group
  /api/v2/groups/endpoints:
    delete:
      description: This request enables remove endpoints from a collection of groups.
        Note that this is only available for manual groups.
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: false
        schema:

      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        example: "[\n\"1188df8c-2548-d6d2-d35a-344cdd002abc\",\n\"a3179781-595c-b8ab-c6df-7aa0a1e24e61\"\
          \ \n]"
        in: body
        multiline: true
        name: body
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          example:
            example: "[\n\"1188df8c-2548-d6d2-d35a-344cdd002abc\",\n\"a3179781-595c-b8ab-c6df-7aa0a1e24e61\"\
              \ \n]"
        description: Generated by Shuffler.io
        required: false
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Add Endpoints to a group
    post:
      description: This request enables remove endpoints from a collection of groups.
        Note that this is only available for manual groups.
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        example: "[\n\"1188df8c-2548-d6d2-d35a-344cdd002abc\",\n\"a3179781-595c-b8ab-c6df-7aa0a1e24e61\"\
          \ \n]"
        in: body
        multiline: true
        name: body
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:

            example: "[\n\"1188df8c-2548-d6d2-d35a-344cdd002abc\",\n\"a3179781-595c-b8ab-c6df-7aa0a1e24e61\"\
              \ \n]"
        description: Generated by Shuffler.io
        required: false
      responses:
        default:
          description: default
          schema: {}
      summary: Add Endpoints to a group_copy
  /api/v2/groups/{id}:
    delete:
      description: ''
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: query
        name: id
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path
        name: id

      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        example: '{"type": "manual", "name": "My group name"}'
        in: body
        multiline: true
        name: body
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          example:
            example: '{"type": "manual", "name": "My group name"}'

        required: false

    get:

      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI

      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: query

      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: query

          type: string
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: path

        schema:
          type: string
      responses:

    patch:

      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI

      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        example: '{"type": "manual", "name": "My group name"}'
        in: body
        multiline: true
        name: body
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          example:
            example: '{"type": "manual", "name": "My group name"}'
        description: Generated by Shuffler.io
        required: false
      responses:
        default:

          schema: {}

    put:

      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI

      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI

        multiline: true

        description: Generated by Shuffler.io

      summary: Modify a specific group
  /api/v2/groups/{id}/endpoints:

      description: This request enables users to add endpoints to specified group(s).

      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI

      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI

        multiline: true

        required: false

  /api/v2/hashes:
    get:
      description: This request retrieves a collection of hashes.
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: query
        name: expression
        required: false
        schema:

      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        in: query
        name: fields
        required: false

      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI

          schema: {}

      description: This request adds a collection of hashes.
      parameters:
      - description: Generated by shuffler.io OpenAPI
        example: "{\n\"912ec803b2ce49e4a541068d495ab570\": \n  {\n    \"type\": \"\
          md5\",\n    \"label\": \"Interesting File\", \n    \"description\": \"Some\
          \ interesting file\", \n    \"impact\": 30\n  }\n}"
        in: body
        multiline: true
        name: body
